decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been submitted to support the discharge of the listed conditions.The application site is located within a Conservation Area, as such, it is of the utmost importance that the details of the proposed building preserve or enhance the special character of the area. Insufficient information has been submitted to demonstrate this.
description: Details required for Conditions 3 (Facing Materials), 4 (Window Details), 11 (Boundary Details), 16 (Waste and Recycling),17 (Cycle Details) and 19 (Parking Management Plan) of planning permission 20/00555/FUL (Demolition of an existing  single storey building and erection of a two storey building to accommodate 4 x apartments and 4x outdoor parking spaces)
